product_name: The North Face Warm Merino Long Underwear Tights - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: With a merino-wool-blend fabric that wicks moisture and dries fast, the women's Warm Merino long underwear tights from The North Face are an ideal midweight layer for active, cold-weather play. Moisture-wicking merino wool, polyolefin and polyester fabric naturally resists odors. FlashDry(TM) micro-particles embedded in the fabric dramatically improve dry time and breathability. Made of crushed coconut shells and crushed volcanic rock, FlashDry micro-particles will not wash out. Next-to-skin fit; flatlock seams help reduce chafing. Closeout.
short_description: With a merino-wool-blend fabric that wicks moisture and dries fast, the women's Warm Merino long underwear tights from The North Face are an ideal midweight layer for active, cold-weather play.
